pageProduct.name: Qsilica Skin Hair & Nails 50 Vegan Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Qsilica Skin, Hair & Nails ORIGINAL Silica Capsules are a convenient form of colloidal silica, a dietary mineral that supports skin, hair and nail health. Formulated to support from within, Qsilica capsules help maintain collagen health and formation as well as supporting skin’s structure and integrity.

Warnings

Always read the label. Follow the directions for use.

Do not use if carton seals are missing or broken. Do not use if blister seal is broken.
 
Store below 25°C.

See base of carton for product expiry date and batch number.

Common Uses

Qsilica Skin, Hair & Nails ORIGINAL Silica Capsules contains colloidal silica, a dietary mineral that supports skin, hair and nail health.

Mineral silica helps maintain collagen health and formation and supports the skin's structure and integrity.

Ingredients

Active ingredient per hard capsule:

Silica – colloidal anhydrous….280 mg
(Equivalent to silicon 130.76 mg)

DOES NOT CONTAIN:
Gluten, Yeast, Dairy or Soy

Directions

Adults: Take one or two capsules per day with a glass of water.
